645170.name: SMILE GAME BUILDER Jacob’s Monster Pack Volume 1
645170.description:
Jacob’s Monster Pack Volume 1

----- About the Artist -----
Jacob Mann is a multi-artist who can create 3D models and music! This is his first official sale on Steam, so don’t miss this chance to buy his excellent creation!

----- About the Resource Pack -----
This resource pack contains unique and powerful 3D monsters which you can use to add a special essence to your original games!

----- Detailed Description -----
There are 10 different 3D monsters included with several color options and sizes for some models. Moreover, there is a bonus model of “Talking Tree”! What a nice surprise!

+ Elemental Earth
+ Elemental Fire
+ Elemental Water
+ Elemental Stone
+ Lizard (w/ 3 color options)
+ Slime (w/ 4 color options and 4 small sizes = Total 8 models)
+ Toad (w/ 3 color options and 3 small sizes = Total 6 models)
+ Giant Wasp
+ Giant Spider (and a small size)
+ Giant Rat
+ Talking Tree (Bonus)

----- About Their Motions -----
Most of the monsters can move with the following actions:
+ Wait + Walk + Run + Skill + Attack + Damage
+ KO + Keepdown + Wait2 + Keepdown2 + Escape

+++ Special Motions +++
Elemental Stone: Sleep, Wakeup
Elemental Water: Block
Slime: Eat
Rat: Sniff
Spider: Fall, Roar
Talking Tree: Sleep, Awake, Laugh, Idle, Sad, Angry, Talking


*This resource pack is royalty-free and available for commercial or non-commercial use only within games rendered using our products, or both using SMILE GAME BUILDER and Exporter for Unity to build to other consoles.

©2017 Jacob Mann
